00044     Bool_t KTEgg::BreakEgg()
00045     {
00046         if (fEggStream.is_open()) fEggStream.close();
00047 
00048         // open the file stream
00049         fEggStream.open(fFileName.c_str(), ifstream::in|ifstream::binary);
00050 
00051         if (! fEggStream.is_open())
00052         {
00053             return kFALSE;
00054         }
00055 
00056         // read the prelude (which states how long the header is in hex)
00057         char* readBuffer = new char [(int)sPreludeSize];
00058         fEggStream.read(readBuffer, sPreludeSize);
00059         if (! fEggStream.good()) return kFALSE;
00060         string newPrelude(readBuffer, sPreludeSize);
00061         this->SetPrelude(newPrelude);
00062 
00063         // convert the prelude to the header size
00064         stringstream conversion;
00065         conversion << readBuffer;
00066         conversion >> std::hex >> fHeaderSize;
00067         std::cout << "header size: " << fHeaderSize << std::endl;
00068 
00069         // read the header
00070         delete [] readBuffer;
00071         readBuffer = new char [fHeaderSize];
00072         fEggStream.read(readBuffer, fHeaderSize);
00073         if (! fEggStream.good()) return kFALSE;
00074         string newHeader(readBuffer, fHeaderSize);
00075         this->SetHeader(newHeader);
00076 
00077         delete [] readBuffer;
00078 
00079         return kTRUE;
00080     }

00082     Bool_t KTEgg::ParseEggHeader()
00083     {
00084         // these items aren't included in the header, but maybe will be someday?
00085         this->SetHertzPerSampleRateUnit(1.e6);
00086         this->SetSecondsPerApproxRecordLengthUnit(1.e-3);
00087 
00088         /*
00089         //some initial code to use the ROOT XML parser instead of mxml
00090         TDOMParser* xmlParser = new TDOMParser();
00091         Int_t xmlParsed = xmlParser->ParseBuffer(fHeader.c_str(), fHeaderSize);
00092         if (xmlParsed != 0)
00093         {
00094             std::cout << "Error in KTEgg::ParseEggHeader: Problem parsing XML (error code " << xmlParsed << ")" << std::endl;
00095             return kFALSE;
00096         }
00097 
00098         TXMLNode* xmlHeader = xmlParser->GetXMLDocument()->GetRootNode();
00099         */
00100 
00101         //mxml_node_t* tree = mxmlLoadString(NULL, (Char_t*)(fHeader->GetArray()), MXML_TEXT_CALLBACK);
00102         mxml_node_t* tree = mxmlLoadString(NULL, fHeader.c_str(), MXML_TEXT_CALLBACK);
00103 
00104         mxml_node_t* dataFormat = mxmlFindElement(tree, tree, "data_format", NULL, NULL, MXML_DESCEND);
00105         if (dataFormat == NULL) return kFALSE;
00106 
00107         stringstream conv;
00108         Int_t intConv;
00109         conv << mxmlElementGetAttr(dataFormat, "id");
00110         conv >> intConv;
00111         this->SetFrameIDSize(intConv);
00112 
00113         stringstream conv2;
00114         conv2 << mxmlElementGetAttr(dataFormat, "ts");
00115         conv2 >> intConv;
00116         this->SetTimeStampSize(intConv);
00117 
00118         stringstream conv3;
00119         conv3 << mxmlElementGetAttr(dataFormat, "data");
00120         conv3 >> intConv;
00121         this->SetRecordSize(intConv);
00122 
00123         this->SetEventSize(this->GetFrameIDSize() + this->GetTimeStampSize() + this->GetRecordSize());
00124 
00125         stringstream conv4;
00126         mxml_node_t* digitizer = mxmlFindElement(tree, tree, "digitizer", NULL, NULL, MXML_DESCEND);
00127         if (digitizer == NULL) return kFALSE;
00128         conv4 << mxmlElementGetAttr(digitizer, "rate");
00129         conv4 >> intConv;
00130         this->SetSampleRate((Double_t)intConv * this->GetHertzPerSampleRateUnit());
00131 
00132         stringstream conv5;
00133         mxml_node_t* run = mxmlFindElement(tree, tree, "run", NULL, NULL, MXML_DESCEND);
00134         if (run == NULL) return kFALSE;
00135         conv5 << mxmlElementGetAttr(run, "length");
00136         conv5 >> intConv;
00137         this->SetApproxRecordLength((Double_t)intConv * this->GetSecondsPerApproxRecordLengthUnit());
00138 
00139         std::cout << "Parsed header\n";
00140         std::cout << "Frame ID Size: " << this->GetFrameIDSize() << '\n';
00141         std::cout << "Time Stamp Size: " << this->GetTimeStampSize() << '\n';
00142         std::cout << "Record Size: " << this->GetRecordSize() << '\n';
00143         std::cout << "Approximate Record Length: " << this->GetApproxRecordLength() << " s" << '\n';
00144         std::cout << "Sample Rate: " << this->GetSampleRate() << " Hz " << '\n';
00145 
00146         return kTRUE;
00147     }

00149     KTEvent* KTEgg::HatchNextEvent()
00150     {
00151         if (! fEggStream.good()) return NULL;
00152 
00153         KTEvent* event = new KTEvent();
00154 
00155         unsigned char* readBuffer;
00156 
00157         // read the time stamp
00158         readBuffer = new unsigned char [this->GetTimeStampSize()];
00159         fEggStream.read((char*)(&readBuffer[0]), this->GetTimeStampSize());
00160         if (fEggStream.gcount() == 0)
00161         {
00162             std::cerr << "Warning from KTEgg::HatchNextEvent: No data was read for the time stamp" << std::endl;
00163             delete [] readBuffer;
00164         }
00165         else
00166         {
00167             KTArrayUC* newTimeStamp = new KTArrayUC(this->GetTimeStampSize());
00168             newTimeStamp->Adopt(this->GetTimeStampSize(), readBuffer);
00169             event->SetTimeStamp(newTimeStamp);
00170             std::cout << "Time stamp (" << newTimeStamp->GetSize() << " chars): ";
00171             for (Int_t i=0; i<newTimeStamp->GetSize(); i++)
00172                 std::cout << (*newTimeStamp)[i];
00173             std::cout << std::endl;
00174         }
00175         if (! fEggStream.good())
00176         {
00177             delete event;
00178             return NULL;
00179         }
00180 
00181         // read the frame size
00182         readBuffer = new unsigned char [this->GetFrameIDSize()];
00183         fEggStream.read((char*)(&readBuffer[0]), this->GetFrameIDSize());
00184         if (fEggStream.gcount() == 0)
00185         {
00186             std::cerr << "Warning from KTEgg::HatchNextEvent: No data was read for the frame ID" << std::endl;
00187             delete [] readBuffer;
00188         }
00189         else
00190         {
00191             KTArrayUC* newFrameID = new KTArrayUC(this->GetFrameIDSize());
00192             newFrameID->Adopt(this->GetFrameIDSize(), readBuffer);
00193             event->SetFrameID(newFrameID);
00194         }
00195         if (! fEggStream.good())
00196         {
00197             delete event;
00198             return NULL;
00199         }
00200 
00201         // read the record
00202         readBuffer = new unsigned char [this->GetRecordSize()];
00203         fEggStream.read((char*)(&readBuffer[0]), this->GetRecordSize());
00204         if (fEggStream.gcount() == 0)
00205         {
00206             std::cerr << "Warning from KTEgg::HatchNextEvent: No data was read for the record" << std::endl;
00207             delete [] readBuffer;
00208         }
00209         else
00210         {
00211             KTArrayUC* newRecord = new KTArrayUC(this->GetRecordSize());
00212             newRecord->Adopt(this->GetRecordSize(), readBuffer);
00213             event->SetRecord(newRecord);
00214         }
00215         //if (! fEggStream.good()) return kFALSE;
00216 
00217         //
00218         event->SetSampleRate(this->GetSampleRate());
00219         event->SetBinWidth(1. / this->GetSampleRate());
00220         event->SetRecordLength((Double_t)(this->GetRecordSize()) * event->GetBinWidth());
00221 
00222         return event;
00223     }
